Text:
Hi eztv,

Thank you from France !!! I look forward to this UL every week !!

Great show & thank you for sharing with a Canadian across the pond !!!

Hi eztv,

Can you please upload "The Wrath of Grapes". It is showing on CBC Monday & Tuesday ( Mar 5&6).

If you can't for whatever reason, I understand.

Thanks for ALL the great uploads from a Canadian in France !!
